title: Unrightful 14-day suspension LIFTED
body:
2 days ago, i got a 14-day suspension, no previous warning or a chat restriction for what was really just a missunderstanding.
heres an article i posted when i got the suspension where  i discussed about the way they detect words such as "kys" and take them out of context.[](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/vV8UiwAZ-14-day-suspension-for-inappropriate-text)
After some chatting with the support team and a few times that i got "No" as an answer another support member got in touch with me and said the he finalized his investigation and decided that the 14-day suspension (and skip on 2 warnings/chat restrictions) was unfair and a misunderstanding.
thus i got a 10-game chat restriction instead plus a few tips to avoid such confusing from happening again:

> Do not quote negative/toxic/inappropriate remarks of other players.
> Do not retaliate to the negative behavior of other players in the same manner
> Be positive! Keeping a sportsmanlike attitude will help you win more games overall. When you find toxicity, don't reply to it! Do not fight fire with fire! Just mute and report the abusive players.
> Be mindful of other players even when talking among your friends in chat. Your friends may know that you're just joking and that you mean no harm, but other players who don't have the full context might get offended by what you say.
> League is a team game, so good communication between you and your teammates is the key. Focus on team play and working together with your team to win - this would allow everyone to have a more pleasant game experience.
Im happy with what i got tbh, i wasn't too much of a good teammate neither was i extremely toxic, and thus i think i do deserve that chat restriction.
Plus it didnt take the support team much time to investigate the matter and come back with an answer.
Sadly tho since the punishment got changed i lost two honor levels instead of one, hopefully the support team can help me with that ^^

First of all, someone else doing something wrong does not make it ok for you to flame them. There is no justification for flaming someone.

Second, the punishment system works in tiers. You get a 10 game chat restrict, a 25 day chat restrict, a 14 day suspension, then a permanent suspension.

If you had already be punished then you would be moved up the ladder. If you had not had one then you could make a thread in the player behavior with your logs and we can go over them there to see what might have caused you to skip tiers.

The Boards isn't the best channel to go through if you want a Rioter response. For that, you want to submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Further, CookieGenerator's case was a weird edge one. They got banned for 'encouragement of self-harm', but the punishment was misinterpreting it as him telling someone to kill themselves _out_ of game, whereas he meant for a teammate to tank a death in-game.

I'm personally not for the overturning of such bans, even in edge-cases like this, since it creates some degree of confusion about the topic ("why did this guy get his punishment reduced after saying "kys" but I still have a 14-day???"). However, even with my personal opinion, I'm glad that CookieGenerator got his issue resolved to some degree.
